Cause of Error: ILC responded with: an exception code, did not respond at all (timeout), did not receive command, or reported fault status
Comment: Number of telemetry losses exceeded threshold

Cause of Error: ILC responded with an exception code or did not respond at all (timeout)
Comment: Based on a monitoring ILC read error. Provides warning for any/all monitoring sensors. Further range checking is performed on signals critical for closed loop control (mirror temp)

Cause of Error: Loss of communication between cRIO and M2 Controller
Comment: cRIO to detect the loss of communications also. cRIO itself goes into fault state.

Cause of Error: Internal ILC issue. ILC did not change state
Comment: Currently - three retries are implemented.

Cause of Error: Measured force exceeded programmable threshold
Comment: Evaluated on an individual actuator basis

Cause of Error: An actuator responded with a closed limit switch in any direction
Comment: Over SAL, only one alarm, locally, log all alarms individually

Cause of Error: An actuator responded with a closed limit switch in any direction
Comment: Over SAL, only one alarm, locally, log all alarms individually

Cause of Error: Communication error or ILC reported fault
Comment: ILC reports bad value for inclinometer error

Cause of Error: Communication error or ILC reported fault
Comment: ILC reports bad value for inclinometer error (when not actively using the inclinometer for closed loop control)

Cause of Error: Excessive angular difference between TCS elevation and local inclinometer
Comment: Difference error checking is configurable

Cause of Error: Measured voltage exceed programmable limits (2-sided)
Comment: Need to cross check tolerance with supplies. Configurable thresholds for voltage tolerance.

Cause of Error: Measured voltage exceed programmable limits (2-sided)
Comment: Need to cross check tolerance with supplies. Configurable thresholds for voltage tolerance.

Cause of Error: Measured voltage exceed programmable limits (2-sided)
Comment: Need to cross check tolerance with supplies. Configurable thresholds for voltage tolerance.

Cause of Error: Measured voltage exceed programmable limits (2-sided)
Comment: Need to cross check tolerance with supplies. Configurable thresholds for voltage tolerance.

Cause of Error: Measured current exceeds programmable limit (1-sided)
Comment: Initial error threshold setting based on measured values, but threshold will be configurable via software.

Cause of Error: Measured current exceeds programmable limit (1-sided)
Comment: Initial error threshold setting based on measured values, but threshold will be configurable via software.

Cause of Error: Power relay did not open when commanded by software.
Comment: Power is not measured after configurable delay when closing relays. Used for detecting the lack of opening of relays when attempting to remove power

Cause of Error: Binary outputs signal power supply health fault
Comment: Binary output from power supply signals determine health. Signals: Internal Fault, Power Supply ON.

Summary: Multi-breaker Trip on Same COMM Power Feed
Cause of Error: Breaker feedback showed two or more breaker trips
Comment: Two breaker trips. Requires two breakers to open on the same feed to generate a fault.

Summary: Multi-breaker Trip on Same MOTOR Power Feed
Cause of Error: Breaker feedback showed two or more breaker trips
Comment: Two breaker trips. Requires two breakers to open on the same feed to generate a fault.

Cause of Error: Breaker feedback showed single breaker trip
Comment: One breaker trip is a warning.

Cause of Error: Based on binary output from redundancy module
Comment: From redundancy module - balances input power from power supplies.

Cause of Error: Measured loop time exceeded 50 ms for three consecutive cycles
Comment: If there are three consecutive warnings, this is a fault.

Cause of Error: Measured loop time exceeded 50 ms for one cycle.
Comment: Warning if a cycle is longer than 50 msec.

Cause of Error: Intake-Exhaust temperature diff exceeded programmable threshold
Comment: Configurable threshold.  Will use the lowest of the inputs and the highest of the exhaust.

Cause of Error: The software properly read in a file but some parameter is out of spec
Comment: The parameters did not pass a sanity check

Cause of Error: The software cannot properly read in the file or something is corrupted with the data read from the file
Comment: Is only assessed when software parameters are initialized

Cause of Error: Sensor value out of range
Comment: Range not programmable (check for reasonableness)

Cause of Error: Sensor value out of range
Comment: Range not programmable (check for reasonableness)

Summary: Mirror Temperature Sensor Out of Range [Fault]
Cause of Error: Sensor value out of range
Comment: Range not programmable (check for reasonableness)

Cause of Error: This fault code is reserved for future expansion
Comment: X

Summary: Airflow Temperature Sensor Out of Range
Cause of Error: Sensor value out of range
Comment: Range not programmable (check for reasonableness)

Summary: Axial Actuator Encoder Out of Range
Cause of Error: Sensor value out of range
Comment: Range not programmable (check for reasonableness)

Summary: Tangent Actuator Encoder Out of Range
Cause of Error: Sensor value out of range
Comment: Range not programmable (check for reasonableness)

Summary: Loss of TMA Communications on Enable
Cause of Error: The MTMount.MotionParameters telemetry is not available when in or transitioning to the Enable state
Comment: Issue a fault when the MTMount motion parameters are not available when in Enable (or transitioning to Enable). The controller cannot operater in SAL without TMA inclination

Cause of Error: The MTMount.MotionParameters telemetry is not available when in or transitioning to the Enable state
Comment: Issue a warning when the MTMount motion parameters are not available when NOT in Enable. The controller does not need the MTMount parameters at this time, therefore -> warning

Cause of Error: The user identifies an error condition that is not detectable via SAL.
Comment: A button is created on the EUI to inject a fault to the controller to allow state transitions when the SAL comm link is lost. Since there is no signal available to identify a loss of SAL comm, the state machine is stranded when SAL is lost. This fault kicks the state machine over to the fault state and allows the system to transition to a safe state where comm can be re-initialized. Can also be used to transition the system to the fault state when issues are observed and not captured under existing fault codes

Cause of Error: Tangent load cell calculations violate any of the four monitoring conditions
Comment: Tangent load cells are monitored with additional checks to ensure their sensible output. Using the weight of the mirror, orientation of the TMA inclination, and all four load bearing tangent acutator loads, the estimated mirror weight can be compared to the known mirror weight.

Cause of Error: Parameter sent by SAL is invalid or unexpected
Comment: Perform reasonableness check on parameter received over SAL
